price: 278. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyow! Dhowra (xilkuu idin saaray) Alle oo iskaga taga waxa ka baaqi ah (kor saarka) ribada, haddaad tihiin mu’miniin.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَذَرُواْ مَا بَقِيَ مِنَ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓاْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wadharū mā baqiya mina al-riba in kuntum mu'minīna
